sourcesContent:
import "./post.css" import { useState } from "react"; import { MoreVert } from "@mui/icons-material" import {Users} from "../../dummyData" export default function post({post}) { console.log(post); let postUser = Users.find((y) => y.id === post.id); // ADDING A STATE AND A FUNCTION FOR LIKE COUNTER let [likes, setLikes] = useState(post.like); const likeFunction = () => { setLikes(likes+1) } return (
{postUser.username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment}
) }
